body:
Comment 3: 
changeset:   1091:360cfd60fc74
user:        Rémy Oudompheng <oudomphe@phare.normalesup.org>
date:        Wed Jun 19 14:19:36 2013 -0700
files:       go/expressions.cc go/expressions.h
description:
compiler: reject incorrect unsafe.Offsetof expressions.

The x.Field argument to Offsetof may not involve hidden
dereferences of embedded pointer fields.

Also correct uninitialized implicit_ field.

R=gofrontend-dev, iant
CC=gofrontend-dev
https://golang.org/cl/10332044

Committer: Ian Lance Taylor <iant@golang.org>

changeset:   1089:6209e9f1d392
user:        Rémy Oudompheng <oudomphe@phare.normalesup.org>
date:        Fri Jun 14 10:57:23 2013 -0700
files:       go/expressions.cc go/expressions.h go/types.cc
description:
compiler: fix computation of Offsetof.

The implied offsets must be taken into account
when the selector involves anonymous fields.

R=gofrontend-dev, iant, bradfitz
CC=gofrontend-dev
https://golang.org/cl/9711046

Committer: Ian Lance Taylor <iant@golang.org>
_Status changed to **Fixed**._
